page.title: 16Housing in Lyndhurst
page.content: The main residential areas are by roads south of Lyndhurst and Goose Green. Also the Clayhill, Meadow and Cedar Estates contain many detatched houses. Most of the houses in the area are privately owned but there are a few council houses and tied cottages. The age of the houses ranges from very new estates, such as the Meadow Estate, to the tied cottages of the forests which are around 400 years old. The prices of houses in the town range from the modern houses at about Â£40 000 to larger houses with stables for about Â£200 000. The average price for a house is Â£84 000. There are a few patches of derelict land south of Lyndhurst which are going to be built over with new houses in the near future.
